About Us

Truvita Pharmaceuticals Pvt. Ltd. is an innovative pharmaceutical company focused on creating high-quality medicines. We aim to enhance healthcare worldwide through cutting-edge research, development, and ethical manufacturing practices.

Founder & CEO

Ajeet Yadav

Founder & CEO, Truvita Pharmaceuticals Pvt. Ltd.

Driven by passion and a vision for the future of healthcare, Ajeet has been leading Truvita with a commitment to innovation, quality, and compassion.
